patch:

@@ -40,10 +40,10 @@

@@ -53,7 +53,7 @@

     <sundrio.version>0.22.1</sundrio.version>
     <gsonfire.version>1.8.5</gsonfire.version>

       </dependency>

       <dependency>
@@ -434,31 +434,21 @@
       <plugin>
         <groupId>com.diffplug.spotless</groupId>
         <artifactId>spotless-maven-plugin</artifactId>
-        <version>2.8.1</version>
+        <version>2.9.0</version>
         <configuration>
           <formats>
             <!-- common settings -->
             <format>
               <includes>
-                <include>examples/**/*.java</include>
-                <include>extended/**/*.java</include>
-                <include>kubernetes/**/*.java</include>
-                <include>proto/**/*.java</include>
-                <include>spring/**/*.java</include>
-                <include>util/**/*.java</include>
+                <include>src/**/*.java</include>
               </includes>
-              <trimTrailingWhitespace />
-              <endWithNewline />
+              <trimTrailingWhitespace/>
+              <endWithNewline/>
             </format>
             <!-- removes wildcard imports -->
             <format>
               <includes>
-                <include>examples/**/*.java</include>
-                <include>extended/**/*.java</include>
-                <include>kubernetes/**/*.java</include>
-                <include>proto/**/*.java</include>
-                <include>spring/**/*.java</include>
-                <include>util/**/*.java</include>
+                <include>src/**/*.java</include>
               </includes>
               <replaceRegex>
                 <name>Remove wildcard imports</name>
@@ -469,12 +459,7 @@
             <!-- removes guava imports -->
             <format>
               <includes>
-                <include>examples/**/*.java</include>
-                <include>extended/**/*.java</include>
-                <include>kubernetes/**/*.java</include>
-                <include>proto/**/*.java</include>
-                <include>spring/**/*.java</include>
-                <include>util/**/*.java</include>
+                <include>src/**/*.java</include>
               </includes>
               <replaceRegex>
                 <name>Forbids guava imports</name>
@@ -484,9 +469,40 @@
             </format>
           </formats>
           <java>
-            <removeUnusedImports /> <!-- self-explanatory -->
-            <googleJavaFormat />
+            <removeUnusedImports/> <!-- self-explanatory -->
+            <googleJavaFormat>
+              <version>1.7</version>
+            </googleJavaFormat>
           </java>
+          <groovy>
+            <!-- These are the defaults, you can override if you want -->
+            <includes>
+              <include>src/main/groovy/**/*.groovy</include>
+              <include>src/test/groovy/**/*.groovy</include>
+            </includes>
+
+            <importOrder>  <!-- or a custom ordering -->
+              <order>java,javax,org,com,com.diffplug,
+              </order>  <!-- or use <file>${basedir}/eclipse.importorder</file> -->
+            </importOrder>
+            <greclipse/>          <!-- has its own section below -->
+            <licenseHeader>
+              <content>

+          </groovy>
           <licenseHeader>
             <content>
